hero.title: Your Gateway to Global Careers
hero.subtitle: Connect with verified employers worldwide. Get deployed in 21-30 days with our AI-powered recruitment platform.

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Everything You Need to Succeed Abroad
features.description: Our comprehensive platform combines cutting-edge AI technology with human expertise to support your global career journey.

aiCVBuilder.title: AI-Powered CV Builder
aiCVBuilder.description: Generate professional CVs instantly with our AI technology. Stand out to employers worldwide.

fasterDeployment.title: Faster Deployment
fasterDeployment.description: Our automated workflows reduce deployment time from 90 days to just 21-30 days.

workerProtection.title: Worker Protection
workerProtection.description: Comprehensive support system with anonymous reporting and 24/7 assistance.

globalOpportunities.title: Global Opportunities
globalOpportunities.description: Connect with verified employers from 30+ countries across all industries.

tracking.title: End-to-End Tracking
tracking.description: Real-time status updates from application to deployment. Always know where you stand.

rewards.title: Rewards Program
rewards.description: Earn points for completing milestones and redeem them for priority processing.

howItWorks.title: Simple Process
howItWorks.subtitle: Your Journey to Global Success
howItWorks.description: From application to deployment in just four simple steps.

step1.title: Create Profile
step1.description: Sign up and build your professional profile with our AI-powered CV builder.

step2.title: Browse & Apply
step2.description: Explore job opportunities and apply to positions that match your skills.

step3.title: Interview
step3.description: Complete video interviews and get matched with the right employers.

step4.title: Get Deployed
step4.description: Complete documentation and start your international career.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Global Career?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of Filipino workers who have found success through Legaforce. Your dream job abroad is just a few clicks away.

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to continue
login.accessOpportunities: Access your opportunities and track your progress

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Start your journey to global opportunities
